Package fr.uge.patchwork2

Class PatchCircle

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.patchwork2.PatchCircle
public class PatchCircle extends Object
Represent the patches available during the game on a circle
Author:
Gabriel Radoniaina / Herv√© Nguyen

  • Method Details

    • size

      public int size()
      returns the size of the PatchCircle
      Returns:
      The size of the PatchCircle

    • getPatch

      public List<Patch> getPatch()
      Getter for field patch
      Returns:
      The field patch, which is a list of Patch

    • choosePatch

      public Patch choosePatch(int patchIndex)
      Picks a patch among the first three in the circle (compared to the neutral token at index 0) and returns it. If the second or third patch is chosen, the patches that are now behind the neutral token will be send at the back of the List.
      Parameters:
      patchIndex - index of the patch to be chosen
      Returns:
      That Patch

    • choosePatch

      public Patch choosePatch(Patch chosen)
      Method used in the graphical mode to "choose" a patch. In the graphical mode, the chosen patch object is already available to the player. But it is necessary to remove that patch from the patch circle
      Parameters:
      chosen - chosen patch
      Returns:
      the patch chosen which is now removed from the patchcircle

    • choiceIsValid

      public boolean choiceIsValid(int patchIndex, int buttonCount)
      Returns true : - if the index of the chosen patch on the PatchCircle is a valid choice and can be bought - if 3 is chosen (equivalent to not choosing a Patch) Otherwise return false (is invalid)
      Parameters:
      patchIndex - index of the chosen patch (or can be 3)
      buttonCount - number of buttons held by the current player
      Returns:
      true or false

    • newPatchCircleBasic

      public static PatchCircle newPatchCircleBasic()
      Creates and returns the PatchCircle for the first version
      Returns:
      PatchCircle the newly created PatchCircle

    • newPatchCircleFull

      public static PatchCircle newPatchCircleFull()
      Creates and returns the PatchCircle for the full version (has a fallback alternative if it doesn't succeed)
      Returns:
      PatchCircle the newly created PatchCircle

    • getTrio

      public List<Patch> getTrio(int n)
      From the integer which asks the "nth" trio of the patchcircle Returns a list containing the asked "trio". The function can return a list which has less than 3 elements, since it will also include the trailing "trio" of the patch circle. (where a trio is incomplete) If the nth trio does not exist, an empty array will be returned
      Parameters:
      n - nth trio
      Returns:
      the list of the patch of that nth trio.
